subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: At age 27, Roger Federer completed a career Grand Slam by winning the French Open over Robin Soderling, 6-1, 7-6 (1), 6-4.
snippet: At age 27, Roger Federer completed a career Grand Slam by winning the French Open over Robin Soderling, 6-1, 7-6 (1), 6-4.
